name: HeyLead
tagline: Autonomous LinkedIn SDR — find leads, send outreach, close deals
description: HeyLead is an MCP-native autonomous LinkedIn SDR that gives your OpenClaw agent 34 specialized tools for LinkedIn outreach. Generate ICPs with buyer personas, create targeted campaigns, send voice-matched personalized invitations, follow up automatically, handle replies with sentiment analysis, and track conversions — all through natural language commands. Supports autopilot (fully autonomous) and copilot (review each message) modes with 24/7 cloud scheduling.

requirements.accounts: Google account + LinkedIn account (connected during setup)
